description.value:
You move as fast and as high as the wind itself. You're permanently @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Quickened]{Quickened}.

You can use your extra action to Stride or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Leap]{Leap}, to provide one of the actions needed for a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.High Jump]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Long Jump]{Long Jump}
